metadata.description: The Microsoft Sentinel workspace into which the function will be deployed. Has to be in the selected Resource Group.
The region of the selected workspace. The default value will use the Region selection above.

properties.displayName: This function merges columns with the same name but different type in several signinlogs tables
properties.query:
T
| extend
    ConditionalAccessPolicies = coalesce(ConditionalAccessPolicies_string, tostring(ConditionalAccessPolicies_dynamic)),
    DeviceDetail = coalesce(DeviceDetail_string, tostring(DeviceDetail_dynamic)),
    LocationDetails = coalesce(LocationDetails_string, tostring(LocationDetails_dynamic)),
    MfaDetail = coalesce(MfaDetail_string, tostring(MfaDetail_dynamic)),
    Status = coalesce(Status_string, tostring(Status_dynamic))
| project-away
    ConditionalAccessPolicies_string,
    ConditionalAccessPolicies_dynamic,
    DeviceDetail_string,
    DeviceDetail_dynamic,
    LocationDetails_string,
    LocationDetails_dynamic,
    MfaDetail_string,
    MfaDetail_dynamic,
    Status_string,
    Status_dynamic
